sentences.en: “a group of boys who hung out together around what they called ‘Barry's Corner’”(&b{Linda Ellerbee})
sentences.cn: “一群在他们所谓的‘巴雷角’消磨时间的男孩们”(&b{琳达·艾勒比})

sentences.en: “We must all hang together, or assuredly we shall all hang separately”(&b{Benjamin Franklin})
sentences.cn: “我们必须团结一致，不然我们肯定会被个别处以绞刑”(&b{本杰明·富兰克林})

sentences.en: All she did was hang around ogling the men in the factory.
sentences.cn: 她所做的就只是在工厂里荡来荡去，朝男人抛媚眼。

sentences.en: Budget problems hung up the project for months.
sentences.cn: 预算问题使得该工程推迟了几个月

sentences.en: decided to hang in despite his illness.
sentences.cn: 尽管他有病在身还是决定坚持

sentences.en: diverse plot lines that did not hang together.
sentences.cn: 不同的剧情线索没有形成一体

sentences.en: Even his closest advisers believe he should hang back no longer.
sentences.cn: 即便是和他关系最密切的顾问都认为他不应该再拖下去了。

sentences.en: Hang in there and you never know what you might achieve.
sentences.cn: 坚持下去，你永远都无法预料会有什么样的收获。

sentences.en: Hang your coat up on the hook.
sentences.cn: 把你的大衣挂在衣钩上。

sentences.en: hanging out with a former boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 与以前的一位男朋友约会

sentences.en: I was worried I wouldn't be able to hang my washing out.
sentences.cn: 我担心自己没法把洗好的衣服晾出去。

sentences.en: If he is found guilty, he will almost certainly hang.
sentences.cn: 如果被判有罪，他几乎肯定会被处以绞刑。

sentences.en: If we give her enough rope, she will hang herself.
sentences.cn: 如果我们让她为所欲为，她一定会栽大跟头的。

sentences.en: it's all quite simple when you get the hang of it.
sentences.cn: 你掌握了操作方法后，就十分简单了。

sentences.en: it's all quite simple when you get the hang of it.
sentences.cn: 你掌握了操作方法后，就十分简单了。

sentences.en: It'sa bit tricky at first till you get the hang of it.
sentences.cn: 刚开始有点儿难，掌握窍门后就好了。

sentences.en: Just hang on a tick, we may be able to help.
sentences.cn: 稍等一会儿，我们或许能帮上忙。

sentences.en: Philip hung his coat on a hook behind the door.
sentences.cn: 菲利普把自己的大衣挂在门后的钩子上。

sentences.en: She hung the sheets on the washing line.
sentences.cn: 她把床单晾在晒衣绳上。

sentences.en: spent the evening just hanging out.
sentences.cn: 每天晚上只是闲荡

sentences.en: The British driver was unable to hang on to his lead.
sentences.cn: 英国车手没能保住自己的领先地位。

sentences.en: The company has been struggling to hang onto its sales force.
sentences.cn: 公司一直竭力想留住自己的销售团队。

sentences.en: The fishing line hung up on a rock.
sentences.cn: 渔船被一块岩石绊住

sentences.en: The King has merely given the politicians enough rope to hang themselves.
sentences.cn: 国王只不过是给了这些政客自缚的绳子。

sentences.en: The President has been trying hard to hang onto power.
sentences.cn: 总统一直在设法抓住权力不放。

sentences.en: the success of the Green movement has left that rather uncomfortable question hanging in the air.
sentences.cn: 绿色运动的成功使这个颇为令人不快的问题悬而未决。

sentences.en: They are getting the hang of it very quickly.
sentences.cn: 他们很快就会找到窍门。

sentences.en: They will then hang back on closing the deal.
sentences.cn: 他们接着会拖延生意的成交。

sentences.en: We can just hang out and have a good time.
sentences.cn: 我们可以只是闲逛一下，开开心。

sentences.en: You can hang lengths of fabric behind the glass.
sentences.cn: 你可以在玻璃后面挂几条织品。

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)学会…的操作方法（或窍门），熟悉…的做法
(非正式，主美)向左（或右）转弯；左（或右）拐
陪伴：和某人在一起；厮混
依附；继续保留；紧紧抓住
香港恒生股票指数；香港恒生银行
【非正式用语】 抑制，障碍：使引起心理上的困境或抑制

trans.tran_en: to put something in a position so that the top part is fixed or supported, and the bottom part is free to move and does not touch the ground

trans.tran_cn: 悬挂，下垂，披下，被绞死，被挂在墙上，贴（墙纸），安装，悬浮，缭绕
trans.tran_en: to kill someone by dropping them with a rope around their neck, or to die in this way, especially as a punishment for a serious crime
